member.name: T:PostSharp.Patterns.Diagnostics.LogAttribute
member.summary: Custom attribute that, when applied on a method, causes PostSharp to implement tracing before and after execution of this method.

member.summary: Initializes a new and specifies a logging profile.

member.name: T:PostSharp.Patterns.Diagnostics.LogLevel
member.summary: Specifies the severity of a logged message.

member.name: F:PostSharp.Patterns.Diagnostics.LogLevel.None
member.summary: No message should be logged.

member.name: F:PostSharp.Patterns.Diagnostics.LogLevel.Debug
member.summary: The message should be logged at Debug/Trace level (when applicable).

member.name: F:PostSharp.Patterns.Diagnostics.LogLevel.Info
member.summary: The message should be logged at Info level (when applicable).

member.name: F:PostSharp.Patterns.Diagnostics.LogLevel.Warning
member.summary: The message should be logged at Warning level (when applicable).

member.name: F:PostSharp.Patterns.Diagnostics.LogLevel.Error
member.summary: The message should be logged at Error level (when applicable).

member.name: F:PostSharp.Patterns.Diagnostics.LogLevel.Fatal
member.summary: The message should be logged at Fatal level (when applicable).

member.name: T:PostSharp.Patterns.Diagnostics.LogOptions
member.summary: Specifies the options for logging parameter names, types and values.

member.name: F:PostSharp.Patterns.Diagnostics.LogOptions.None
member.summary: No parameter information included.

member.name: F:PostSharp.Patterns.Diagnostics.LogOptions.IncludeParameterType
member.summary: Includes parameter type information.

member.name: F:PostSharp.Patterns.Diagnostics.LogOptions.IncludeParameterName
member.summary: Includes parameter name.

member.name: F:PostSharp.Patterns.Diagnostics.LogOptions.IncludeParameterValue
member.summary: Includes parameter value, by calling on the object instance.

member.name: F:PostSharp.Patterns.Diagnostics.LogOptions.IncludeReturnValue
member.summary: Includes the return value.

member.name: F:PostSharp.Patterns.Diagnostics.LogOptions.IncludeThisArgument
member.summary: Includes the value of this argument in an instance method.
